name: comp4050-bam
description: COMP4050 BAM Project - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: npm run dev:check || npm run dev:setup
scripts.dev:check: npm run deps:check && npm run db:check && npm run backend:dev
scripts.dev:setup: npm run setup && npm run backend:dev
scripts.dev:full: npm run dev:check:full || npm run dev:setup:full
scripts.dev:check:full: npm run deps:check && npm run db:check && concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.dev:setup:full: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.setup: npm run deps:install && npm run db:start && npm run backend:db:setup
scripts.setup:fresh: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.deps:install: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install
scripts.db:check: docker-compose ps postgres | findstr healthy > nul 2>&1
scripts.db:start: docker-compose up -d postgres && npm run db:wait
scripts.backend:db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
